articles.title: Indian Idol 12: Neha Kakkar and Rohanpreet Singh relive wedding memories in new ‘shaadi special’ episode,... - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Singers Neha Kakkar and Rohanpreet Singh, who got married in October, will feature in an upcoming ‘shaadi special’ episode of Indian Idol 12. They will be joined by comedienne Bharti Singh and her writer husband Haarsh Limbachiyaa.
